column3: Brother of Sirius. Used to be a Death Eater but defected.
Best friend of James Potter and godfather of Harry.
Killed by a werewolf. She was a gryffindor student who dated Ron.
Ravenclaw student who dated Cedric Diggory and Harry Potter.
Father of Crabbe and death-eater who escaped Azkaban.
Slytherin student who was best friends with Goyle and followed Draco.
Head of the department of Internation Magical Cooperation. Killed by his son.
Death Eater who impersonated Alastor Moody.
Participated in the Triwizard tournament and married Bill Weasley.
Participated in the Triwizard tournament and got killed by Voldemort.
Albus' brother and owner of Hog's Head.
Headmaster of Hogwards killed by Snape.
Muggle son of Vernon and Petunia and first-cousin of Harry.
Harry's aunt and sister of Lily.
Harry's muggle uncle.
Squib caretake of Hogwards.
Harry's friend and member of Dumbledore's army.
Creator of the Philosopher's Stone.
Minister of Magic that was forced to resign.
Death Eater and father of Gregory Goyle.
Best friend of Crabbe. Slytherin student and dies by falling into Fiendfyre.
One of Harry's best friend and marries Ron Weasley.
Half-giant who loves Harry. He was the keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwards.
Highmaster of Durmstrang and reformed death-eater.
Participant in the Triwizard tournament. Dated Hermione.
Death Eater who was killed by Molly Weasley.
Mother of Neville who was tortured by Bellatrix.
Father of Neville who was tortured by Bellatrix.
Gryffindor student who was a member of Dumbledore's army.
Ravenclaw student who was a member of Dumbledore's army.
Father of Luna and editor of The Quibbler.
Friend of James Potter and werewolf. He married Nymphadora.
Slytherin student who had many arguments with Harry.
Father of Draco and influential Death-Eater.
Mother of Draco and sister of Bellatrix.
Half-giantess and headmistress of Beauxbatons.
Professor of Transfiguration and head of Gryffindor.
Retired auror and member of the order of the Phoenix. Killed by Voldemort.
Betrays James and Lily Potter. Follower of Voldemort.
The boy who lived. Main character of the series.
Father of Harry. Murdered by Voldemort.
Mother of Harry. Murdered by Voldemort.
Possessed by Voldemort. Defence against the Dark Arts professor.
Muggle father of Voldemort who was killed by him.
Muggle mother of Voldemort who was killed by him.
The antagonist of the series who murdered many.
Reporter at the Daily Prophet.
Head of the Slytherin house and saved Harry in many occasions.
Married Remus Lupin and was killed by Bellatrix.
Senior undersecretary to the Ministry of Magic. Eventually sent to Azkaban.
Father of the Weasleys and member of the Order of the Phoenix.
Oldest son of Arthur and Molly. Husband of Fleur.
Second son of Arthur and Molly. Works with dragons in Romania.
Identical twin with George and co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes
Identical twin with Fred and co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes
Marries Harry Potter and only daughter of Molly and Arthur.
Wife of Arthur and mother of the Weasleys. Kills Bellatrix.
Third son of Arthur and Molly. He is a Gryffindor prefect.
Harry's best friend. Marries Hermione.
House elf and friend of Harry. He is killed by Bellatrix.
Three-headed dog belonging to Rubeus Hagrid.
Harry's owl.
Ghost at Hogwards.
Acromantula belonging to Rubeus Hagrid.
Giant-half brother of Hagrid.
